title: Apply to Graduate
description: A student in their final semester needs to formally apply for graduation.

tasks.description: Identify the student and guide them to the online graduation application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct URL from the registrar's website.

tasks.description: Run a preliminary degree audit to ensure the student is on track to complete all requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audit shows the student will meet all requirements upon successful completion of their current courses.

tasks.description: Assist the student in completing the application, including confirming the name they want printed on their diploma.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the student submit the application successfully.
